strings:
<se_def>*: Ah! You've brought the magic mirror,
if I'm not mistaken. May I have a look?

<se_def>*: Hm? How strange!
I don't sense any magic in the mirror at all.

<se_def>*: It's only a magic mirror if it has magic in it!
Without magic, it's just an unmagical mirror,
or rather, a mirror!

<se_def>*: I just don't understand it.
I know it contained magic when I examined it with the old wizard...
<se_def>*: Hmm, curious... Maybe he could provide an explanation. I certainly have no idea.
